arcs.justification: Primary arc: establishes conformity as core narrative driver for premise "In a village where time flows differently for each inhabitant, three clockmakers compete to build the one clock that will synchronize everyone, not knowing that unified time will erase the village's ability to dream."
arcs.progression: Setup and escalation of conformity through sadness
